1215.question: Do any of the evaluations show that adversarial learning improves performance in at least two different language families?

3-Figure2-1.png: Yes, both evaluations show that adversarial learning improves performance in at least two different language families. In the German test, the accuracy increases from 0.74 to 0.76 with adversarial training. In the Japanese test, the accuracy increases from 0.64 to 0.66 with adversarial training.</s>
Yes, according to the caption, adversarial learning improves performance in at least two different language families, German and Japanese, as shown in Figure 2.</s>
